section.name: Overview
section.p: genesis is an open-source framework that aims to bring simplicity and productivity to enterprise application development, ensuring scalability, robustness and testability of your software. The main goal is to simplify the development of business components and the construction of complex graphical interfaces with minimum effort for developers. To accomplish its mission, genesis combines several open-source frameworks in a completely transparent way for developers, through the use of AOP (Aspect Oriented Programming). Our main challenge is to allow people with little knowledge of the Java platform to develop robust applications fast, without requiring them to learn several new technologies and complex concepts. We invite you to experience our approach to the problem.

subsection.name: Developers
subsection.p: Download genesis and read the User manual. Run the samples and start developing using the ready-to-use project structure. You will be creating your own applications in a short period. If you have any questions, read our FAQ and join our mailing list. To subscribe to our mailing list, just send an e-mail to users-subscribe@genesis.dev.java.net. Then, just reply to the confirmation e-mail sent by the server. To send any messages to our list, write to users@genesis.dev.java.net.

subsection.name: Framework Developers
subsection.p: To understand genesis architecture better, please refer to the advanced documentation. Find out details about technologies used by the framework (AOP, IoC, etc).

section.name: Questions?
section.subsection: Subscribe to our mailing list and have your questions answered by the genesis core team.
